      static int cuda.cuFuncGetAttribute(IntPointer pi, int attrib, cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc)
      \brief Returns information about a function Returns in \p *pi the integer value of the attribute \p attrib on the kernel given by \p hfunc.
      static int cuda.cuFuncSetBlockShape(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int x, int y, int z)
      Deprecated. 
      Specifies the \p x, \p y, and \p z dimensions of the thread blocks that are created when the kernel given by \p hfunc is launched.
      static int cuda.cuFuncSetCacheConfig(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int config)
      \brief Sets the preferred cache configuration for a device function On devices where the L1 cache and shared memory use the same hardware resources, this sets through \p config the preferred cache configuration for the device function \p hfunc.
      static int cuda.cuFuncSetSharedMemConfig(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int config)
      \brief Sets the shared memory configuration for a device function.
      static int cuda.cuFuncSetSharedSize(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int bytes)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets through \p bytes the amount of dynamic shared memory that will be available to each thread block when the kernel given by \p hfunc is launched.
      static int cuda.cuLaunch(cuda.CUfunc_st f)
      Deprecated. 
      Invokes the kernel \p f on a 1 x 1 x 1 grid of blocks. The block contains the number of threads specified by a previous call to ::cuFuncSetBlockShape().
      static int cuda.cuLaunchGrid(cuda.CUfunc_st f, int grid_width, int grid_height)
      Deprecated. 
      Invokes the kernel \p f on a \p grid_width x \p grid_height grid of blocks. Each block contains the number of threads specified by a previous call to ::cuFuncSetBlockShape().
      static int cuda.cuLaunchGridAsync(cuda.CUfunc_st f, int grid_width, int grid_height, cuda.CUstream_st hStream)
      Deprecated. 
      Invokes the kernel \p f on a \p grid_width x \p grid_height grid of blocks. Each block contains the number of threads specified by a previous call to ::cuFuncSetBlockShape().

      \brief Launches a CUDA function Invokes the kernel \p f on a \p gridDimX x \p gridDimY x \p gridDimZ grid of blocks.

      static int cuda.cuOccupancyMaxPotentialBlockSize(IntBuffer minGridSize, IntBuffer blockSize, cuda.CUfunc_st func, cuda.CUoccupancyB2DSize blockSizeToDynamicSMemSize, long dynamicSMemSize, int blockSizeLimit) 
      static int cuda.cuOccupancyMaxPotentialBlockSize(IntPointer minGridSize, IntPointer blockSize, cuda.CUfunc_st func, cuda.CUoccupancyB2DSize blockSizeToDynamicSMemSize, long dynamicSMemSize, int blockSizeLimit)
      \brief Suggest a launch configuration with reasonable occupancy Returns in \p *blockSize a reasonable block size that can achieve the maximum occupancy (or, the maximum number of active warps with the fewest blocks per multiprocessor), and in \p *minGridSize the minimum grid size to achieve the maximum occupancy.

      \brief Suggest a launch configuration with reasonable occupancy An extended version of ::cuOccupancyMaxPotentialBlockSize.
      static int cuda.cuParamSetf(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int offset, float value)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets a floating-point parameter that will be specified the next time the kernel corresponding to \p hfunc will be invoked. \p offset is a byte offset.
      static int cuda.cuParamSeti(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int offset, int value)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets an integer parameter that will be specified the next time the kernel corresponding to \p hfunc will be invoked. \p offset is a byte offset.
      static int cuda.cuParamSetSize(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int numbytes)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets through \p numbytes the total size in bytes needed by the function parameters of the kernel corresponding to \p hfunc.
      static int cuda.cuParamSetTexRef(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int texunit, cuda.CUtexref_st hTexRef)
      Deprecated. 
      Makes the CUDA array or linear memory bound to the texture reference \p hTexRef available to a device program as a texture. In this version of CUDA, the texture-reference must be obtained via ::cuModuleGetTexRef() and the \p texunit parameter must be set to ::CU_PARAM_TR_DEFAULT.
      static int cuda.cuParamSetv(cuda.CUfunc_st hfunc, int offset, Pointer ptr, int numbytes)
      Deprecated. 
      Copies an arbitrary amount of data (specified in \p numbytes) from \p ptr into the parameter space of the kernel corresponding to \p hfunc. \p offset is a byte offset.
